title: All things EcmaScript 6
blurb: This month: join us for a scooba dive in the newly approved ES6 features, WebAssembly, ASM.js and what all these buzz words mean for the web.

speakers.title: ES6: Diving Deeper
speakers.name: Steve Venzerul
speakers.synopsis: In my previous talk we saw an intro to new ES6 features, but everything was still in flux. Now that TC39 has finally approved the draft it's time to get a good feel for what's new and exciting in ES6. Additionaly we'll discuss the latest and greatest 'WebAssembly' and what it means for Javascript.

links.title: Best current implementation of ES6 features. Start using it today!
